attributes.comment: Having a centralized directory of providers has some merit; assuring patients that questionable providers are not just moving from state to state and equally providing patients with the locations of the best providers in their field.  But how will you ever keep it current? Other data bases (nursing homes for example) are out of date as quickly as they are added. They are sold and the name doesn't change for 6 months to a year; let alone the ranking and latest surveys. I see the same problem for providers. Thanks for the opportunity to voice a concern

displayProperties.name: pageCount
displayProperties.label: Page Count

attributes.title: Comment on CMS-2022-0163-0001
